disclaimer.title: Welcome to Nilos!
disclaimer.description:
You have to be a legal representative of the company (Director, CEO, President, ...) to access Nilos services.

If you are not legally entitled to open an account on behalf of your company, please directly send an email to compliance@nilos.io.

company_search.title: Find your company
company_search.description:
Please proceed with the necessary verifications listed below. 
Our team will analyze your data and keep you informed about the outcome of your case.

nilos_account.title: Your Nilos account
nilos_account.description: Tell us about how you will use your Nilos account.

company_website.label: Your company website
company_website.helper: Please provide the URL of your company's website

company_operational_address.label: Your company operational address
company_operational_address.helper: Only fill this field if your operational address is different from the official headquarter address

company_activity.label: Your company activity
company_activity.helper: Please explain in a few words what your company does and how it is connected to cryptocurrencies

options.Electricity, gas, steam, and air conditi: Electricity, gas, steam, and air conditioning supply
options.Water supply, sewerage, waste management: Water supply, sewerage, waste management, and remediation activities
options.Wholesale and retail trade; repair of mo: Wholesale and retail trade; repair of motor vehicles and motorcycles
options.Public administration and defense; compu: Public administration and defense; compulsory social security
options.Human health and social work activities: Human health and social work activities
options.Activities of households as employers; u: Activities of households as employers; undifferentiated goods- and services-producing activities of households for own use
options.Activities of extraterritorial organizat: Activities of extraterritorial organizations and bodies

last_year_turnover.label: Last year turnover
last_year_turnover.helper: In euros - Please enter the amount your company's turnover on 2022

company_assets.label: Company assets
company_assets.helper: In euros - Please mention how much are evaluated the assets owned by the company

source_of_funds.label: Source of funds
source_of_funds.helper: Please provide an explanation of the anticipated source of the cryptos you will receive on your Nilos account

estimate_deposit_monthly.label: Estimated generated deposits on your Nilos account (monthly)

are_you_a_pep.label: Are you, or any beneficial owner of the company, considered as a PEP?
are_you_a_pep.helper: A politically exposed person (PEP) is an individual with a high profile political role, or someone who has been entrusted with a prominent public function

are_you_a_us_person.label: Are you, or any beneficial owner of the company, a US Person?
are_you_a_us_person.helper: A "U.S. person" is any citizen of the United States (including a person born in the United States who resides abroad and who has not renounced his American citizenship); any legal resident of the United States (including a US green card holder); and any permanent resident of the United States.
